TopicTitle: How dyou you get a kerbal to sit on the seat?

Articles.Content: For some reason I can't sit on it... It sounds very noobish but seriously, I can't get on it.

For some reason I can't sit on it... It sounds very noobish but seriously, I can't get on it.

I think it's in the right click context menu, not certain though. It's what I got told, not tried it yet.
Right-click on the chair, and you'll see the command in the context menu that appears.
